author: OrchidAlloy
description:
Translate messages using Google Translate for free. Supports context menu commands with slashtags:
  [p]st global message "Translate" {c:translateslash {message} {hide}}
install_msg:
ðŸŽŒ __**EasyTranslate**__ ```EasyTranslate installed. Instructions:
1. Load the cog with [p]load easytranslate
2. Try replying to a message with [p]translate or [p]translate to [language]

3. Optionally, your users may set their default language for translation with [p]setmylanguage
4. Optionally, install slashtags and add a message command like this:
  [p]st global message {c:translateslash {message} {hide}}```
short: Translate messages using Google Translate for free.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
